price: ጌታችሁ ያ ከችሮታው ትፈልጉ ዘንድ መርከቦችን በባሕር ለይ ለእናንተ የሚነዳላችሁ ነው፡፡ እነሆ እርሱ ለናንተ አዛኝ ነውና፡፡
arabic: رَّبُّكُمُ ٱلَّذِي يُزۡجِي لَكُمُ ٱلۡفُلۡكَ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ لِتَبۡتَغُواْ مِن فَضۡلِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ بِكُمۡ رَحِيمٗا

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: rabbukumu alladhī yuz'jī lakumu al-ful'ka fī al-baḥri litabtaghū min faḍlihi innahu kāna bikum raḥīman
